message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about optics and the behavior of light. When marbles are in the right light, they can act as a prism and refract (bend) the light passing through them. This refraction of light can create a dispersion of the different wavelengths, resulting in the formation of rainbows. Option (B) is unrelated to the behavior of light. Option (C) is not scientifically accurate as marbles do not have the ability to create demons. Option (D) is not correct because marbles do not make the sun appear, as the sun is already present and visible in the sky.

Option (D) is incorrect because marbles do not affect the appearance of the sun.
